procedure: The admission procedure involves submitting an application form online, providing required documents, and attending an interview.
requirements: General requirements include a completed application form, official transcripts, test scores (SAT/ACT), and a personal statement.
deadlines: The deadline for fall semester applications is December 1st, and for spring semester applications, it is July 1st.
application_status: You can check your application status by logging into the admissions portal with your application ID.
Hey: Hi, How can I help you?
date: The admissions will start from the 5th of November
